modelView:
{
      "type": "page",
      "name": "componentTestPage",
      "title": "Component Test Page",
      "scriptingLanguage": "JavaScript",
      "components": [
            {
                  "name": "testRadioModel",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "staticData": [
                        {
                              "gender": "F",
                              "description": "Female"
                        },
                        {
                              "gender": "M",
                              "description": "Male"
                        },
                        {
                              "gender": "U",
                              "description": "Unknown"
                        }
                  ]
            },
            {
                  "name": "nationResource",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "staticData": [],
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.stvnation"
            },
            {
                  "name": "testSelectModel",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "staticData": [
                        {
                              "code": "A",
                              "description": "Car",
                              "vehicle": "C"
                        },
                        {
                              "code": "B",
                              "description": "Bicycle",
                              "vehicle": "B"
                        },
                        {
                              "code": "C",
                              "description": "Lorry",
                              "vehicle": "L"
                        },
                        {
                              "code": "D",
                              "description": "Van",
                              "vehicle": "V"
                        }
                  ]
            },
            {
                  "name": "course",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "staticData": [],
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.course"
            },
            {
                  "name": "terms",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "staticData": [],
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.f_term"
            },
            {
                  "name": "programmes",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "staticData": [],
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.f_programme"
            },
            {
                  "name": "formBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "label": "Form Block",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "testForm1",
                              "type": "form",
                              "label": "Test Form 1",
                              "nextButtonLabel": "Next",
                              "showInitially": true,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "testSelectComponent",
                                          "type": "select",
                                          "sourceModel": "testSelectModel",
                                          "labelKey": "description",
                                          "valueKey": "code",
                                          "sourceParameters": {},
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "label": "Test select:"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testRadioComponent",
                                          "type": "radio",
                                          "sourceModel": "testRadioModel",
                                          "labelKey": "description",
                                          "valueKey": "gender",
                                          "label": "Test Radio:",
                                          "sourceParameters": {},
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testTextComponent",
                                          "type": "text",
                                          "label": "Test text:",
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "placeholder": "Enter some text.",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testDisplayComponent",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Test display:",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false,
                                          "value": "Display only value"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testTextAreaComponent",
                                          "type": "textArea",
                                          "label": "Test textarea:",
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "placeholder": "Enter some multi-line text",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testNumberComponent",
                                          "type": "number",
                                          "label": "Test number:",
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "fractionDigits": 2,
                                          "placeholder": "Enter a number",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "value": "6"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testDatetimeComponent",
                                          "type": "datetime",
                                          "label": "Test datetime:",
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testEmailComponent",
                                          "type": "email",
                                          "label": "Test email:",
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testTelephoneComponent",
                                          "type": "tel",
                                          "label": "Test telephone:",
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testLinkComponent",
                                          "type": "link",
                                          "label": "Test link:",
                                          "url": "http://www.google.com",
                                          "replaceView": true,
                                          "description": "Google link"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testBooleanComponent",
                                          "type": "boolean",
                                          "label": "Test boolean:",
                                          "booleanTrueValue": "Y",
                                          "booleanFalseValue": "N",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "testButtonComponent",
                                          "type": "button",
                                          "label": "test button",
                                          "onClick": "alert('testButtonComponent clicked');"
                                    }
                              ]
                        }
                  ]
            },
            {
                  "name": "gridBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "label": "Grid Block",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "nationGrid",
                              "type": "grid",
                              "model": "nationResource",
                              "label": "Nation Grid",
                              "parameters": {},
                              "allowNew": false,
                              "allowModify": false,
                              "allowDelete": false,
                              "allowReload": false,
                              "pageSize": 5,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "STVNATN_CODE",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Code",
                                          "model": "STVNATN_CODE",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "STVNATN_NATION",
                                          "type": "text",
                                          "label": "Nation",
                                          "model": "STVNATN_NATION",
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    }
                              ]
                        }
                  ]
            },
            {
                  "name": "listBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "label": "List Block",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "termsList",
                              "type": "list",
                              "model": "terms",
                              "label": "Term",
                              "allowReload": false,
                              "parameters": {},
                              "required": false,
                              "pageSize": 5,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "value": "STVTERM_CODE",
                              "onClick": "$TermCode = currentSelection.STVTERM_CODE;\n$LevelCode = null;\n$Campus = null;\n$College = null;\n$termProgramDetail.$load();\n$programDetailBlock.$visible = true;"
                        }
                  ]
            },
            {
                  "name": "programDetailBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "showInitially": false,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "termProgramDetail",
                              "type": "detail",
                              "model": "programmes",
                              "label": "Programmes for Term $TermCode",
                              "parameters": {
                                    "TERM": "$TermCode",
                                    "LEVL": "$LevelCode",
                                    "CAMPUS": "$Campus",
                                    "COLLEGE": "$College"
                              },
                              "allowNew": false,
                              "allowModify": false,
                              "allowDelete": false,
                              "allowReload": false,
                              "pageSize": 5,
                              "loadInitially": false,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "SMRPRLE_PROGRAM",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Program",
                                          "model": "SMRPRLE_PROGRAM",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "SMRPRLE_PROGRAM_DESC",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Description",
                                          "model": "SMRPRLE_PROGRAM_DESC",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    }
                              ]
                        }
                  ]
            },
            {
                  "name": "htmlTableBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "label": "HTML Table Block",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "courseHTMLTable",
                              "type": "htable",
                              "model": "course",
                              "label": "Courses Table",
                              "parameters": {},
                              "allowNew": false,
                              "allowModify": false,
                              "allowDelete": false,
                              "allowReload": false,
                              "pageSize": 5,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "courseNumber",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Course Number",
                                          "model": "courseNumber",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "subjectCode",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Subject Code",
                                          "model": "subjectCode",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "courseTitle",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Title",
                                          "model": "courseTitle",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    }
                              ]
                        }
                  ]
            }
      ]
}
